segment.source: Notifications Visualizer is a new Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app in the Store that helps developers design adaptive live tiles for Windows 10.
segment.target: Notifications Visualizer is a new Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app in the Store that helps developers design adaptive live tiles for Windows 10.

segment.source: Notifications Visualizer
segment.target: Notifications Visualizer

segment.source: Notifications Visualizer
segment.target: Notifications Visualizer

segment.source: Notifications Visualizer is a new Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app in the Store that helps developers design adaptive live tiles for Windows 10.
segment.target: Notifications Visualizer is a new Universal Windows Platform (UWP) app in the Store that helps developers design adaptive live tiles for Windows 10.

segment.source: Overview
segment.target: Overview

segment.source: The Notifications Visualizer app provides instant visual previews of your tile as you edit, similar to Visual Studio's XAML editor/design view.
segment.target: The Notifications Visualizer app provides instant visual previews of your tile as you edit, similar to Visual Studio's XAML editor/design view.

segment.source: The app also checks for errors, which ensures that you create a valid tile payload.
segment.target: The app also checks for errors, which ensures that you create a valid tile payload.

segment.source: This screenshot from the app shows the XML payload and how tile sizes appear on a selected device:
segment.target: This screenshot from the app shows the XML payload and how tile sizes appear on a selected device:

segment.source: screenshot of notifications visualizer app editor with code and tiles
segment.target: screenshot of notifications visualizer app editor with code and tiles

segment.source: With Notifications Visualizer, you can create and test adaptive tile payloads without having to edit and deploy the app itself.
segment.target: With Notifications Visualizer, you can create and test adaptive tile payloads without having to edit and deploy the app itself.

segment.source: Once you've created a payload with ideal visual results you can integrate that into your app.
segment.target: Once you've created a payload with ideal visual results you can integrate that into your app.

segment.source: See Send a local tile notification to learn more.
segment.target: See Send a local tile notification to learn more.

segment.source: Note Notifications Visualizer's simulation of the Windows Start menu isn't always completely accurate, and it doesn't support some payload properties like baseUri.
segment.target: Note Notifications Visualizer's simulation of the Windows Start menu isn't always completely accurate, and it doesn't support some payload properties like baseUri.

segment.source: When you have the tile design you want, test it by pinning the tile to the actual Start menu to verify that it appears as you intend.
segment.target: When you have the tile design you want, test it by pinning the tile to the actual Start menu to verify that it appears as you intend.

segment.source: Features
segment.target: Features

segment.source: Notifications Visualizer comes with a number of sample payloads to showcase what's possible with adaptive live tiles and to help you get started.
segment.target: Notifications Visualizer comes with a number of sample payloads to showcase what's possible with adaptive live tiles and to help you get started.

segment.source: You can experiment with all the different text options, groups/subgroups, background images, and you can see how the tile adapts to different devices and screens.
segment.target: You can experiment with all the different text options, groups/subgroups, background images, and you can see how the tile adapts to different devices and screens.

segment.source: Once you've made changes, you can save your updated payload to a file for future use.
segment.target: Once you've made changes, you can save your updated payload to a file for future use.

segment.source: The editor provides real-time errors and warnings.
segment.target: The editor provides real-time errors and warnings.

segment.source: For example, if your app payload is limited to less than 5 KB (a platform limitation), Notifications Visualizer warns you if your payload exceeds that limit.
segment.target: For example, if your app payload is limited to less than 5 KB (a platform limitation), Notifications Visualizer warns you if your payload exceeds that limit.

segment.source: It gives you warnings for incorrect attribute names or values, which helps you debug visual issues.
segment.target: It gives you warnings for incorrect attribute names or values, which helps you debug visual issues.

segment.source: You can control tile properties like display name, color, logos, ShowName, badge value.
segment.target: You can control tile properties like display name, color, logos, ShowName, badge value.

segment.source: These options help you instantly understand how your tile properties and tile notification payloads interact, and the results they produce.
segment.target: These options help you instantly understand how your tile properties and tile notification payloads interact, and the results they produce.

segment.target: This screenshot from the app shows the tile editor:

segment.target: screenshot of notifications visualizer editor with tiles
